scripts.gateway: wait-on tcp:$userms_port && wait-on tcp:$postsms_port && wait-on tcp:$permsms_port && npm run gateway --prefix gateway
scripts.compileServices: npm i user --prefix user && npm i posts --prefix posts && npm i perms --prefix perms && npm i gateway --prefix gateway
scripts.removeNodeModules: rm -r user/node_modules && rm -r posts/node_modules && rm -r perms/node_modules && rm -r gateway/node_modules && rm -r node_modules
scripts.installModuleAlias: npm i -C user -S module-alias && npm i -C posts -S module-alias && npm i -C perms -S module-alias && npm i -C gateway -S module-alias
scripts.addNodeModulesFolder: mkdir -p node_modules && mkdir -p user/node_modules && mkdir -p posts/node_modules && mkdir -p perms/node_modules && mkdir -p gateway/node_modules
scripts.compile: npm run addNodeModulesFolder && npm run compileServices && npm i
